DialogueNodes.Text: Hey Sis! Where have you been?

Responses.Text: Have you seen that thing she keeps as her 'pet?'

DialogueNodes.Text: Pet? What are you talking about

Responses.Text: She has this monster, this weird spider thing with a human face!

DialogueNodes.Text: Agh! I'm not a stupid kid anymore sis! You always do this. Make up stories to get your way.

Responses.Text: Why would you trust that witch who tried to get me killed and not your own sister.
I know it's hard to belive, but as your sister please belive me!

DialogueNodes.Text: (He runs off out the back door, leaving you with nothing but humming of electric lights)
